templates.name: Code won't work
templates.content: Most discount codes exclude a small number of products we sell because they are already listed at the lowest price available. Usually these exclusions include Dexcom, Flowflex, and "get one free" products, or products already on sale (with the red sale tag).

templates.name: Can I order syringes without prescription/license?
templates.content: The following states require a prescription for quantities over 10 syringes: CT, ME, NJ, NY. If you order over 10 syringes to these states, we must confirm your prescription.

templates.name: Which items require a prescription?
templates.content: All items that require a prescription are marked with an "RX" icon on the product page. Please be sure to check the RX Requirements tab on the product page for details as some RX items only require a prescription in certain states.

templates.name: Do you ship internationally?
templates.content: At this time we only offer shipping within the United States and select U.S. territories. This includes the 50 U.S. states, Puerto Rico, Armed Forces Americas, Armed Forces Europe, and Armed Forces Pacific.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship the majority of orders from our Fort Lauderdale, FL location. Some orders may be shipped directly from our suppliers' distribution center, depending on the items purchased.

templates.name: How do I order items that require a prescription?
templates.content: Find the items you need and place your order through our website as normal. If you already have a prescription on hand, you can upload it here: https://www.totaldiabetessupply.com/pages/upload-your-prescription and we will ship out your order as soon as we receive it.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1-877-977-7709 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that, but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.totaldiabetessupply.com/collections/clearance

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/totaldiabetessupply/?hl=en and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/totaldiabetes/

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to apply for wholesale is to go here: https://www.totaldiabetessupply.com/pages/wholesale-request-form

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customer-service@totaldiabetessupply.com or give us a call at 877-977-7709. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at  customer-service@totaldiabetessupply.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here - https://www.totaldiabetessupply.com/pages/shipping-and-policies#returns

templates.name: Are you open for pick up orders?
templates.content: At this time, we're not offering the option to pick up orders from our Fort Lauderdale office due to COVID-19 precautions. Apologies for the inconvenience!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We usually ship via USPS, UPS or FedEx, and once shipped, it will take 3-7 business days domestically.

templates.name: Do you accept insurance?
templates.content: At this time we don't accept insurance, we're an out-of-pocket supplier. We offer a 5% discount on auto-ship orders for every 30, 60, or 90 days on Infusion Sets and Dexcom Sensors.

templates.name: Free shipping/Shipping Cost
templates.content:
We offer free standard shipping on orders over $79
 within the contiguous US. Orders under $79 will be charged with weight-based shipping rates, which you can check here: https://www.totaldiabetessupply.com/pages/shipping-and-policies

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.totaldiabetessupply.com/apps/tracktor/track
